required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on November 19, 2021
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Pressure Guidewire System Multi-center, Prospective, Self-Control, Clinical Trial
clinical_study.official_title: Pressure Guidewire System Multi-center, Prospective, Self-Control, Clinical Trial

brief_summary.textblock: Participants with intermediate-grade coronary stenosis undergo measurement of fractional flow reserve using the test article (Zurich Pressure Guidewire System) and predicate article (Abbott PressureWire System). Both articles are used within the same participant and the FFR values are statistically compared with each other.

primary_outcome.measure: Compared FFR Measurement Between Test Article and Predicate Article

arm_group.arm_group_label: FFR Measurement in Intermediate-Grade Coronary Stenosis
arm_group.description: Participants with intermediate-grade coronary stenosis undergo measurement of fractional flow reserve using the test article (Zurich Pressure Guidewire System) and predicate article (Abbott PressureWire System).

intervention.description: FFR is measured sequentially with the test article and the predicate device.
intervention.arm_group_label: FFR Measurement in Intermediate-Grade Coronary Stenosis

provided_document.document_type: Study Protocol, Statistical Analysis Plan, and Informed Consent Form
